Text: TO SEE WHAT IS INCLUDED , click on 31 in front of FILES - below Applications > Android.

keep ur upload speed at '0' (maximum) to download at high speed ,

 i have hundreds of seeding tasks in my seeding queue therefore initial seeding may be a a bit slow .
Kind of clueless here. How do i stop the license check?

To disable licence check, you need to be rooted, then just disable background data and syncing for that specific app. I am sure it also works if you are non rooted and you can download an app that lets you specify 'permissions' for a specific app. I always root so as to have complete control over what apps do.
